::Feline::

She looked at HotRod, "I'm sorry. I don't mean to disappoint you. 
I...I just...," She looked at him and bit her lower lip. She 
whipsered, "I'm sorry." She leaned forward and wrapped her arms 
around his neck.  She held onto him and tried not to cry again.  She 
trembled a little as she held him close. She whispered, "I'm still a 
little scared I guess."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He saw that she really didn't want to.
> "Hey, if you dont want to, thats ok." He kissed her again. He was 
happy
> enough, now, just being with her.
> "What do you want to do? Stay here?"
>
